instructions.ar: اسلك مسار الدوران واخرج باتجاه Destination 1
instructions.de: Im Kreisverkehr die Ausfahrt Richtung Destination 1 nehmen
instructions.en: Enter the roundabout and exit towards Destination 1
instructions.eo: Enveturu trafikcirklon kaj elveturu direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Entra en la rotonda y sal hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Entra en la rotonda y sal hacia Destination 1
instructions.fi: Aja liikenneympyrään ja valitse erkanemiskaista suuntana Destination 1
instructions.fr: Prendre le giratoire et sortir en direction de Destination 1
instructions.he: השתלב במעגל התנועה וצא לכיוון Destination 1
instructions.hu: Hajtson be a körforgalomba, majd hajtson ki erre: Destination 1
instructions.id: Masuk bundaran dan keluar menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Entra nella rotonda e prendi l’uscita verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: 環状交差点に入り、Destination 1へ向かう
instructions.my: Destination 1ပေါ်သို့အဝိုင်းပတ်လမ်းမှထွက်ပါ
instructions.nl: Ga de rotonde op en sla af richting Destination 1
instructions.no: Kjør inn i rundkjøringen og deretter ut mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Wjedź na rondo i wyjedź w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Entre na rotatória e saia sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Entre na rotunda e saia em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Intrați în sensul giratoriu și ieșiți spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: На круговой развязке сверните в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Zapeljite v krožišče in ga zapustite v smeri proti Way Name
instructions.sv: I rondellen, ta av mot Destination 1
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşağa gir ve Destination 1 istikametinde çık
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь по колу в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Đi vào bùng binh và ra về Destination 1
instructions.yo: Tẹ ọna iṣọwo ati jade lọ si ọna Destination 1
